_comment: Escribe cada término, regla o par de palabras como un string separado por comas dentro de la lista 'terms'. Cada string será una línea en la aplicación.
terms: 'straight' can be translated as 'hetero' when the conversation refers to their sexual orientation

This text belongs to the Xianxia, Cultivation, and Immortals genres, which are subgenres of Chinese fantasy literature. These genres often feature themes of martial arts, spiritual growth, and supernatural powers. When translating, ensure the terminology and cultural nuances are accurately conveyed to maintain the intended meaning and atmosphere.
